categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems space stations

nodes.text: The Pammant shipyards were an ring-shaped shipyard that orbited the planet Pammant. The shipyards were crewed by members of the Quarren species, and were affiliated with the Confederacy of Independent Systems. The shipyards were most famous for constructing the massive Subjugator-class heavy cruisers. Near the end of the Clone Wars, an accident bathed the shipyards and the planet in radiation, killing every living being in both locations.
